entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 8:22 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:22 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
